attributes.action: Ban fireworks from being sold to the public
attributes.additional_details: In this day and age with people suffering from illnesses, mental health disorders, ptsd, etc, etc, (the list is endless) it's about time something was done to reduce the stress, life at the moment is stressful enough without adding to it, that's not even mentioning the criminal activity that such 'celebrations' bring.
attributes.background: We want fireworks banned from being sold to the public and only used for organised display

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
